Pampanga State University.what_theyre_known_for: Affordable quality education and strong engineering licensure performance, serving as the main campus of the Pampanga State University system.
Pampanga State University.dorm_apartment: On-campus dormitories and nearby apartments available.
Pampanga State University.transport_access: Along Jose Abad Santos Ave., accessible via jeepneys and tricycles.
